verses.verse: I will sing <WH7891> of loving kindness <WH2617> and justice. <WH4941> To you, <WH3068> Yahweh, I will sing praises. <WH2167>

I will be careful <WH7919> to live a blameless <WH8549> life. <WH1870> When will you come <WH935> to me? <WH1980> I will walk within <WH7130> my house <WH1004> with a blameless <WH8537> heart. <WH3824>
I will set <WH7896> no vile <WH1100> thing <WH1697> before my eyes. <WH5869> I hate <WH8130> the deeds <WH6213> of faithless <WH7750> men. <WH1692> They will not cling to me.
A perverse <WH6141> heart <WH3824> will be far <WH5493> from me. <WH3045> I will have nothing to do with evil. <WH7451>
I will silence <WH6789> whoever secretly <WH5643> slanders <WH3960> his neighbor. <WH7453> I won't <WH3201> tolerate one who is <WH5869> haughty <WH1362> and <WH3824> conceited. <WH7342>
My eyes <WH5869> will be on the faithful <WH539> of the land, <WH776> that they may dwell <WH3427> with me. <WH1980> He who walks in a perfect <WH8549> way, <WH1870> he will serve me. <WH8334>
He who practices <WH6213> deceit <WH7423> won't <WH3427> dwell within <WH7130> my house. <WH1004> He who speaks <WH1696> falsehood <WH8267> won't <WH3559> be established before my eyes. <WH5869>

Morning <WH1242> by morning, <WH6789> I will destroy all the wicked <WH7563> of the land; <WH776> to cut off <WH3772> all the workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205> from Yahweh <WH3068>'s city. <WH5892>
